prod_desc: Help Snow White choose a pie to bake for her animal friends!
prod_long_desc:
Stop by for a visit at Disney Snow White’s Forest Cottage, featuring an oven and chimney, tree with fruit and a picnic table for Snow White and her animal friends. Includes a simple guide to build and play, and bigger pieces help build confidence in younger kids. LEGO® Juniors is an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 4-7. Includes a mini-doll figure and 2 animal figures.
Includes a Disney Snow White mini-doll figure, plus deer and chipmunk figures.
Features a cottage with a tree and fruit, picnic table, opening windows and an opening oven with chimney.
Use the broom to clean up around the cottage.
Pick the cherries and apple from the tree to put in the basket.
Pour some ‘tea' from the teapot into the cup to drink.
Take the pie from the oven and get ready for a treat.
Includes Easy to Build models with bigger pieces and a simple guide to get kids building and playing quickly.
Accessory elements include a teapot, pie, cup, broom, kettle, red apple, 2 berries and a basket.
Cottage measures over 3” high, 3” wide and 2” long.
Oven measures over 2” high, 1” wide and 1” long.
